info.name: Dec 2013 Nicer large YouTube video
info.description: In December 2013, YouTube changed its style. However, the big video size is smaller than the page width and it looks rather bad. This makes the video container exactly as wide as the rest of the page, instead.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 01-01-2014 (happy new year everyone!)
- Video now properly gets centered (would sometimes nudge to the right before).
